title: Team Recruitment OCE Plat + looking for Mid, Top and support

embed.description: Sheet1 Name/ Nickname, IGN, Peak Rank, Current Rank, Role, Availability Time schedule AEST Ewok, SF Ewok, Plat 1, Plat 4, ADC, 4-9pm Monday- Thursday, 11am-9pm Weekends

body:
Hi My name is Imagine I am a staff member for a new and upcoming OCE organization.
We are currently looking to add some new players to one of our teams.
This is a plat plus team and we are currently  looking for three positions to trial these will be in Mid, Top and Support.
Requirements for application to this team:

- Actively played in S 8 preferably 100 games minimum so we can assess your history
- Plat 4 rank last season or current preseason minimum
- Previous team environment experience preferable but not required
- Communication capabilities e.g. microphone
- Decent communication etiquette
- Willing to accept constructive criticism and open to adopt/improve on fixes to play that are given by coaching staff
- Competitive drive

If you fit this description have drive to improve and are interested in joining an organization that supports competitive growth please fill out the google docs form above and you will be contacted for a trial.
